DOC.brief_summary: This Phase I open-label , parallel-group clinical study healthy term pregnant female undergo caesarean section . Two administration oxytocin test , uterine contractility assess .
DOC.brief_title: Compare Efficacy Oxytocin Administrations Postpartum Uterine Contractility
